articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from President of Cuban Council of State
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from President of Cuban Council of State
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message on March 9 from Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on the 70th birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade,
					
					 Please accept our tribute to Comrade Kim Jong Il who made a precious contribution to developing the excellent relations of friendship between our two countries on the occasion of his 70th birth anniversary.
					
					 I renew the assurances of the highest consideration to you.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Gives Performances at KPA Units
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Gives Performances at KPA Units
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus started performances at Defence Unit on Cho Islet and Unit 123 of the Navy of the Korean People's Army on March 10.
					 Keeping the promise made with service personnel on Cho Islet after visiting them despite rough sea, the islet associated with the revolutionary legend of general secretary Kim Jong Il, Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un sent the State Merited Chorus to the post on the islet and the unit defending the forefront on the west coast. 
					
					 Among the audience were service personnel of the Defence Unit and the Unit and their families.
					
					 Put on the stage were male choruses "Song of the Korean People's Army" and "Our General Is the Best", male duet and male chorus "Soldiers Live near the General" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats of Kim Jong Il who trained the KPA into an invincible revolutionary army to defend socialism of Juche and provided a sure military guarantee for the prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 Male chorus "Yearning Is Boundless", male solo and male chorus "Song of Comradeship" and male chorus "The General Is Always Alive as the Sun" mesmerized the audience. They were moved to tears as the songs represented the ceaseless forced marches of guerrilla style made by Kim Jong Il all his life in jumper and the long Songun journeys made by him with total dedication rain or snow.
					
					 Choruses "For My Only Motherland" and "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" resounded like shouts reflecting the faith of the service personnel defending the Songun brilliant commander standing on the forefront of revolution under the ever-victorious banner. 
					
					 Male choruses "Footsteps" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un with Our Lives" represented the death-defying resolution of the revolutionary army to carry forward and accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause which was pioneered on Mt. Paektu and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification without fail, keeping pace with the footsteps of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance continues.

articles.title: Servicepersons and People Continue to Vow to Wipe Out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Servicepersons and People Continue to Vow to Wipe Out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- More meetings took place in various cities (districts) and counties of the DPRK at which servicepersons and people vowed to wipe out through a merciless sacred war the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 At the meetings the statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers at the meetings said that it is the unpardonable evil act that the group of traitors kicked up hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with slandering Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak and puppet military warmongers are the sworn enemy of the nation, maniacs of confrontation with the nation and the top pro-U.S. sycophantic traitors. 
					
					 Only corpses and deaths await rat Myung Bak and other immoral persons who make desperate efforts to keep their remaining days.
					
					 Traitors such as Lee, Kim Kwan Jin and Jong Sung Jo have been consigned to the dustbin of history.
					
					 The speakers voiced their pledge to make hot wind of great innovation and leaping progress rage on all fronts of building a thriving nation, determined to make retaliation to wipe out the sworn enemies.

articles.title: Ever-growing Resentment toward S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
Ever-growing Resentment toward S. Korean Regime
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The people in the DPRK are lifting up their voice of demanding punishment of Lee Myung Bak and military warmongers of south Korea who dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 Following the Pyongyang soldier-civilian rally on March 4, similar rallies have taken place in provinces, cities and counties of the country to swear punishment of the Lee group of traitors.
					
					 Ralliers scathingly condemned the Lee Myung Bak group which committed thrice-cursed treason after creating a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula by again launching in collusion with the U.S. imperialists war exercises against the DPRK, which is still in the mourning period.
					
					 Terming the Lee group a gang of traitors inferior to a beast, they declared that they would never tolerate this group which defamed the ideology and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 At the rallies workers, youth and students, peasants and women branded traitor Lee Myung Bak and Kim Kwan Jin, Jong Sung Jo and other military warmongers, who masterminded the hideous provocation, as human dregs that would find no breathing spell on this land and sky.
					
					 At every military post servicepersons are expressing anger and vowing vengeance on those traitors, chanting, "Kill Myung Bak" and "Let's beat military warmongers to death".
					
					 They have stepped up combat training in high spirits to blow up Chongwadae, the headquarters of plot breeders.
					
					O Myong Nam, an officer of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, told KCNA:
					
					 "The group of traitors, scared at the resentment of all our army and people, are making some poor excuses. But we, all members of the Red Guards, reject them as disgusting and ridiculous attempt.
					
					 On behalf of the nation we will mercilessly destroy them to the last man."
					
					 Meanwhile houses of class education across the country have been crowded with visitors and meetings with war veterans have taken place.

articles.title: Public Is Best Judge
articles.content:
Public Is Best Judge
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A rumor that south Korea's Lee Myung Bak was dead had swept throughout the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Saturday.
					 In this regard, Tokko Hyon Song, living in Phyongchon District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 "I will feel relieved if Lee Myung Bak dies as the rumor says. The article carried by the daily Rodong Sinmun Sunday is indicative of public sentiments. I believe that resentment toward the Lee group of traitors has turned to be the rumor.
					
					 As there is a saying 'the public is the best judge', the Lee group, heinous traitors to the nation, will find no a shelter in this land and sky."
					
					 Jong In Bok, living in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province, said:
					
					"Even if Lee Myung Bak, little different to a beast, died, it is needless to pin hope on the south Korean regime. But, the rumor represents the surging indignation against the Lee group.
					
					 The public has already sentenced a death penalty to Lee. Now, death only awaits him."
					
					 On Saturday, a rumor that Lee Myung Bak died of heart attack had swept Pyongyang and other local areas across the country, which had driven the local people to an ecstasy of joy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Just, Sacred War of Retaliation Is Sure to Win Victory
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Just, Sacred War of Retaliation Is Sure to Win Victory
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The army and the people of the DPRK will never overlook the hideous provocation of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors but force it to pay a price for having sought to tarnish the image of the Korean nation and insult its dignity, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a bylined article.
					 The group committed the worst crime against the humanity, rubbing salt into the wounds of the people, who uphold the great persons of Mt. Paeku as their father, only to send their resentment running high. It was an unpardonable act which threatened and ruthlessly violated the life, destiny and future of the Korean people as well as the shameless act of treachery aimed to prolong its remaining days by driving a wedge between compatriots and estranging the Koreans from each other, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The group of traitors should clearly understand that it can never redeem the crime it committed against the compatriots even though it turns to forlorn wandering spirit.
					
					  We will never remain an onlooker to the south Korean conservative media which played the role of a paid trumpeter to rub salt into the wounds of the people and escalated confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK will settle accounts with the enemies with the recent incident as an occasion and ostracize the south Korean conservative forces and media on all accounts.
					
					  The Lee group of traitors will be made to experience the might of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu which defeated the Japanese and U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Is Source of War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Is Source of War 
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A source of war on the Korean Peninsula at present is none other than the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors as it is getting frantic with the moves to start a nuclear war against the DPRK in collusion with outside forces. Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a bylined article.
					 It is necessary to settle accounts by force of arms with those heinous warmongers and the group of traitors, utterly indifferent to the nation and ethics, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The war hysteria of the Lee Myung Bak group is so alarming and reckless that it puts the successive military fascist dictators into the shade.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is now kicking up war hysteria, blustering it would not rule out even a war, not content with its most hideous acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean nation will never be able to get rid of the on-going instable situation unless the source of war is rooted out. The Lee group should be severely punished through a sacred war of retaliation as it is frantically bringing the dark clouds of war to hang over the Korean Peninsula. This is the only way for bringing lasting peace to the peninsula and realizing the cherished desire for national reunification.
					
					 It is the final conclusion drawn by the service personnel and people of the DPRK that they should give vent to their pent-up hatred and the spirit of taking revenge upon the group of traitors and achieve national reunification as it made undisguised provocations against them.
					
					 Those warmongers hell-bent on saber-rattling should never be allowed to go scot-free.
					
					 There is no breathing spell in this world for the Lee group which goes reckless like a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun U.S. War Moves Are Bound to Fail
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun U.S. War Moves Are Bound to Fail
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists, who have fought wars of aggression in different parts of the world, are now creating terror-ridden atmosphere aligned with Israel in the Mideast and with the south Korean puppet forces and the Japanese reactionaries in and around the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article.
					 The imperialists' moves for a war can never escape strong rebuff and denunciation of the world peace-loving people, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Imperialism never goes to ruin of itself. Only strong actions on the part of independent forces can accelerate the ruin of imperialism.
					
					 The spirit of independence against imperialism serves as the most powerful weapon for foiling the imperialists' moves for war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists dare not provoke the DPRK as they are fearful of the Korean people who are firmly united in the spirit of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 Not word but strong capabilities for self-defence can frustrate the imperialists' outrageous war moves.
					
					 Countries aspiring independence against imperialism can achieve durable peace when they protest against imperialists' moves for a war of aggression by their concerted efforts.
					
					 Victory is in store for the world peace-loving people fighting the imperialists' outdated and reactionary war moves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japanese Reactionaries' Gangsterism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japanese Reactionaries' Gangsterism
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Japanese public security authorities recently mobilized at least 200 armed policemen under the pretext of "investigation" and forcibly searched institutions under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and seized things, on the "suspicion of unlawful export" of computers to their homeland.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says:
					
					 It can never be tolerated as this is an illegal act of gangsterism to impair the authority and prestige of the dignified DPRK and obliterate Chongryon by stirring up bitterness toward the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 The search was launched right after the funeral for the chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon that came right after the unexpected loss of general secretary Kim Jong Il. The unparalleled violation committed by the Japanese reactionaries bereft of an elementary etiquette showed that their moves to obliterate the patriotic movement of Chongryon have reached the height.
					
					 It is their aim to case Chongryon, create confusion and tarnish its image and thus touch off animosity towards the DPRK in Japan's society and create terror-ridden atmosphere against Chongryon.
					
					 The economic activities of Koreans in Japan are their inviolable right that no one can plunder or harm.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries will have to take on the responsibility for catastrophic outcomes to be entailed by their sordid moves against the DPRK and Chongryon.

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Seminar Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Seminar Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Many foreigners visited Mangyongdae on Monday. Among them were delegates from China, Netherlands, Denmark, Germany, the U.S., UK and Canada and the executive director of the Environmental Education Media Project (EEMP) who took part in the International Seminar on Forest and Landscape Restoration.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and his family members, the guests looked round historic relics there.
					
					 Executive Director of the EEMP Kosima Weber Liu said it was her honor to visit Mangyongdae before April, significant month commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. She was deeply moved to see the historic relics persevered in their original state, she added.
					
					 They also toured the International Friendship Exhibition House, the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, etc.

articles.title: New Method of Salt Production Developed
articles.content:
New Method of Salt Production Developed
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Yonbaek Saltern of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has succeeded in producing salt from underground brine.
					 The underground water is divided into freshwater, chlorinated water, brine, etc. according to its mineral content.
					
					 The salinity of underground brine is more than 50 grams per liter.
					
					 The method of producing salt with brine is very profitable as it helps raise the production of salt 2-5 times per hectare with less area and production cycle than with seawater.
					
					 The west coast of Korea has favorable conditions for underground brine with large deposits.
					
					 The government has taken necessary measures to increase the salt production with underground brine while exploring for it in various parts of the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers to Stage Large-scale Joint Ground Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers to Stage Large-scale Joint Ground Drill
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The First Division of the south Korean puppet army announced that it would stage large-scale joint ground drill in the area of Phaju, Kyonggi Province from March 13 to 15, south Korean Yonhap News reported.
					 The warmongers openly declared that the drill is aimed at examining the "integrated defense posture" of the civilians, government employees, army and police to cope with someone's "provocation and terrorism".
					
					 To be involved in the drill are tanks and other war hardware and huge armed forces, the news said.
					
					 The puppet warmongers hell bent on the fever of a war against the north are escalating confrontation and tension through various war exercises in different parts of south Korea while staging the Foal Eagle joint military exercises in league with the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: S. Korea Bogged by Household Debt Crisis
articles.content:
S. Korea Bogged by Household Debt Crisis 
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Household debt has now reached an all-time high of nearly one trillion U.S. dollars in south Korea.
					 The debt that had annually increased over 5 percent from 2000 now totals 929 billion U.S. dollars beyond the internationally set danger line.
					
					 Debt for each household amounts to more than 1.7 times its yearly average income, topping the world list.
					
					 40 percent of household debt was what the families loaned from the banks with their houses as collateral.
					
					 As the householders' income shrank and the house prices decreased more than 15 percent as against the past period under the influence of the economic downturn, the banks are now finding it unable to get back even the principal, to say nothing of interests.
					
					 This is an inevitable product of the unpopular economic policy of Lee Myung Bak who pushed the economy into bankruptcy and the people's lives into destitution. It is the unanimous public opinion that the upcoming parliamentary and presidential elections will serve as a harbinger heralding the puppet group's ruin.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Slammed by Organizations of Brazil, Colombia
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Slammed by Organizations of Brazil, Colombia
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Brazil and Colombia condemned the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK in a statement on March 1 denounced the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique for staging the large-scale joint military exercises. The statement said:
					
					 The current saber-rattling once again reminds people of the historic fact that the U.S. ignited a war against the DPRK on June 25, 1950. The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, the coward servants of the U.S. keen to make the Koreans slaves of imperialism, are joining the U.S. imperialists in their ceaseless moves to invade the DPRK.
					
					 The group, not content with its reckless moves to gratify its dirty greed, kicked up such unpardonable hysteric rackets as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					
					  The criminal acts committed by the group this time are not simple provocations but showed the Lee group is no more than a bandit of traitors kowtowing to the U.S. imperialists, the worst enemies of mankind.
					
					 We bitterly condemn the criminal moves of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia in a statement on March 7 condemned the war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities as reckless acts of aggravating the situation and threatening peace. The statement noted:
					
					 The provocative military exercises for aggression are acts going against the atmosphere of dialogue, reconciliation, self-restraint and peace.
					
					 We strongly condemn the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.

articles.title: Book Ridiculing Lee Myung Bak Very Popular in South Korea
articles.content:
Book Ridiculing Lee Myung Bak Very Popular in South Korea
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A book written by a famous south Korean Buddhist in which he hurled all sorts of curses at Lee Myung Bak, likening him to a rat, is very popular among south Korean people.
					 Kyonghyang Daily News, Herald Economy and other south Korean newspapers vied with each other to introduce the book.
					
					 The author of the book explained the reason why he published such book as follows: "People may call society a happy one where they can feel worth living only when they help one another in the sense of trust and morality. Trust and morality and helping each other make the world beautiful. I couldn't remain a passive onlooker to what Lee Myung Bak has done quite contrary to them."
					
					 He deplored in the preface of the book that "in the era of MB (Myung Bak) morality collapsed and the people are in serious despair."
					
					 The book having seven chapters branded Lee Myung Bak as a liar, former convict, real estate speculator, the worst "president" and retrogressive bodhisattva. 
					
					 In the sub-title of the book "It's like preaching to rat's ears," the author wrote: "When I was keen to find out what was the worst trouble in my house, I learned it was exactly a rat. It was good for nothing as it stole rice. It was none other than Lee Myung Bak".
					
					 He continued: "Lee is not a local rat but the rat from the U.S. as it is steeped in pro-Americanism to the marrow of its bones." "Let water run into the rathole." "MB is ill-famed for lack of face, shamelessness and impudence. What MB says is not worth even a penny. He had better sell mung bean pancake at South Gate after his dethronement and society in which the president tells lies is bound to go to ruin."
					
					 The book vividly reflects the mind-set of the angry south Koreans.  It warns Lee Myung Bak, the rat, is fated to drown in the rathole full of water.

articles.title: Actions against FTA Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions against FTA Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking the Conclusion of the South Korea-U.S. Free Trade Agreement held a press conference in Seoul on March 6 and declared actions for checking the effectuation of the humiliating FTA.
					 At the conference the organization denounced the "government" of Lee Myung Bak for planning to put the FTA into force on March 15 although the nature of the FTA as an agreement causing losses to south Korea and unequal one and the one infringing upon its sovereignty has been brought to light.
					
					 The organization also assailed the Saenuri Party for zealously backing the effectuation of the humiliating agreement, far from reflecting on its wrong act of railroading the agreement through the "National Assembly".
					
					 It declared that it would launch widespread actions including a candlelight rally after proclaiming an emergency situation to check the effectuation of the FTA.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Planning to Host "Nuclear Security Summit"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Planning to Host "Nuclear Security Summit"
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy of south Korea held a press conference on March 8 and denounced the puppet group for planning to host what it called "nuclear security summit" in Seoul.
					Speakers at the conference said that the military tensions on the Korean Peninsula now run highest since the June 25 war due to Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in south Korea launched when the north was in the mourning days. The unspeakable defamatory words hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the north that were written on the walls and doors of the puppet military forces in Inchon City also contributed to escalating tensions.
					
					 Under these circumstances the "government" is planning to open the "nuclear security summit" and discuss the "nuclear issue of the north". This is as foolish an act as jumping into the fire with faggot on its back and it may spark a new world war, they warned.
					
					 They strongly called for the immediate stop to the joint military exercises targeting the north and the immediate cancellation of the summit.
					
					 The organization said that it would send an open letter reflecting the demands to delegates of different countries to the summit.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak "Government" Is Responsible for Blast of Rock on Jeju Island: S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak "Government" Is Responsible for Blast of Rock on Jeju Island: S. Korean Paper
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- South Korean newspaper Hangyore in an editorial on March 8 said anti-"government" spirit is mounting owing to the construction of naval base on Jeju Island pushed forward by the south Korean authorities. 
					 It said: The military authorities at dawn on March 7 finally blew up Kurombi rock, a rare natural one in Kangjong Village of Jeju Island. 
					
					 After the explosion, the inhabitants cried.
					
					 The Kurombi rock that was formed between 300,000 and 100,000 years ago is on the way to destruction. 
					
					 What authority do they have?
					
					 It enraged not only inhabitants of Kangjong Village but other people. 
					
					 Several decades have passed since the April 3 resistance on the Jeju Island. Kangjong Village in March is dim with grey smoke. 
					
					 More than 600 policemen are in the village of some 1,000 inhabitants. 
					
					 Hundreds of inhabitants were arrested in little more than two years and 109 were taken off this year alone. 
					
					 The explosion of the Kurombi rock is the declaration of war against the Jeju islanders.
					
					 The trust and expectation of the inhabitants broke down. 
					
					 Showdown between the "government" and the Jeju Island will follow.
					
					 Jeju Island this spring is facing angry waves. 
					
					 We hope that they will withdraw from the rock. 
					
					 All the responsibility for the conflict rests with the Lee Myung Bak regime.

articles.title: Provocative Remarks of S. Korean Warmongers Flayed
articles.content:
Provocative Remarks of S. Korean Warmongers Flayed 
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has not yet come to senses, far from making apology for its thrice-cursed crimes. It is still going on the rampage, reeling off spate of provocative remarks that it will not remove the billboard at issue but will take revenge and punishment.
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a bylined commentary:
					
					 The vituperation made by the Lee group is so ridiculous that it reminds one of a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					 The matchless and strong revolutionary army that has grown up under the loving care of the great persons of Mt. Paektu is waiting for an order for action. All the people are ready to go into action to stamp out the group at one blow.
					
					 Even though the puppets come to their knees and apologize for their thrice-cursed crimes, it can never calm down the DPRK army and people determined to retaliate against the group.
					
					 The group is the sworn enemy of the Korean nation to be stamped out at any cost.
					
					 It is self-evident that words will not work on the war maniacs as they are set to stand in confrontation with the DPRK, regardless of whether the present situation develops into war.
					
					 Now that the group provoked the DPRK in the extremely hideous manners, the army and the people of the DPRK will never miss the golden chance but blow up all the group of traitors by fully displaying the might of Songun built up in every way, and achieve the historic cause of national reunification without fail.
					
					 This is the ultimate determination of the army and the people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Palestinian Women Stage Anti-Israel Demos
articles.content:
Palestinian Women Stage Anti-Israel Demos 
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of Palestinian women celebrated International Women's Day by staging demonstrations against Israel in the West Bank and the Gaza Strip on March 8. 
					 In the West Bank, they marched to Qalandya checkpoint between Ramallah and Kuds, throwing stones at the Israeli soldiers, who responded with tear gas. In Gaza, women gathered in the Unknown Soldier Park, waving Palestinian flags and posters expressing solidarity for Shalabi, a Palestinian woman on hunger strike in an Israeli prison. They strongly demanded the Israeli authorities' immediate release of her.

articles.title: 12 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in NW Pakistan
articles.content:
12 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in NW Pakistan
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- At least 12 people were killed and three others injured in a U.S. drone strike launched Friday in Pakistan's northwest tribal area of South Waziristan bordering Afghanistan. 
					 Up to date, at least 60 people have reportedly been killed and 17 others injured in such strikes since the beginning of this year.

articles.title: Greek Jobless Rate Hits New Record
articles.content:
Greek Jobless Rate Hits New Record
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Greek jobless rate hit a new record of 21 percent in December 2011, bringing the number of unemployed to 1.03 million, the Greek Statistical Authority (ELSTAT) said on Thursday.
					 This is 6.2 percent increase over that in the same period of the previous year.

articles.title: Iran Dismisses Obama's Remarks on Sanctions as "Illusion"
articles.content:
Iran Dismisses Obama's Remarks on Sanctions as "Illusion"
 Tehran, March 11 (KCNA) -- Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, when interviewed by a TV broadcasting service on Thursday, dismissed as an "illusion" the remarks made by U.S. President Barack Obama that Iran is under crippling sanction pressures.
					 "Lingering on this illusion will deal a blow to the United States and will prove their calculation to be a failure," he said.

articles.title: Israel's Threats to Iranian Nuclear Facilities Violate IAEA's Charter: Iran
articles.content:
Israel's Threats to Iranian Nuclear Facilities Violate IAEA's Charter: Iran
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Iran's permanent representative to the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) Ali Asghar Soltanieh said when interviewed on Thursday in Vienna continuous threat of Israeli aggression against Iran's nuclear facilities violated IAEA resolutions.
					 The ambassador reaffirmed that Iran's nuclear program was for peaceful purpose.
					
					 He called upon IAEA to fulfill its responsibility in this regard.

articles.title: Cuba to Test Effective New AIDS Vaccine on Humans
articles.content:
Cuba to Test Effective New AIDS Vaccine on Humans
 Havana, March 11 (KCNA) -- Cuba has unveiled a new AIDS vaccine which has successfully been tested on mice, and the country is ready to begin human testing soon, a local newspaper said on Tuesday.

articles.title: Palestinian Issue Key to Mideast Stability: Ereka
articles.content:
Palestinian Issue Key to Mideast Stability: Erekat
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Palestinian issue is a key to achieving peace, prosperity, security and stability in the Middle East region, a senior Palestinian official said Friday.
					 The Palestinian cause should be achieved and the establishment of an independent Palestine with east Jerusalem as its capital be guaranteed, Erekat said.

articles.title: China Trains Women Pilots
articles.content:
China Trains Women Pilots
 Beijing, March 11 (KCNA) -- China is paying much attention to training women pilots.
					 The first women pilots flew over Tiananmen Square on March 8, 1952 after the foundation of new China.
					
					 Since then, China has trained 328 women pilots in the past 60 years.
					
					 They have also positively took part in the economic construction and relief operations in the areas hit by disasters.

articles.title: 6.0-magnitude Earthquake Hits Xinjiang
articles.content:
6.0-magnitude Earthquake Hits Xinjiang
 Beijing, March 11 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 6.0 on the Richter scale jolted a county in Hetian of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region on Friday. 
					 The epicenter was at the depth of about 30 kilometers.

articles.title: Work Posted on Internet Homepage of Regional Organization
articles.content:
Work Posted on Internet Homepage of Regional Organization
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was posted on Internet homepage of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on March 7. 
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution. 
					
					 It also deals with the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Stand of DPRK Favored by Foreign Organizations, Figure
articles.content:
Stand of DPRK Favored by Foreign Organizations, Figure
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations and figure of different countries issued statements between March 4 and 6 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for committing the most hideous provocations against the DPRK.
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, the All India Agricultural Workers' Union, the All India Peasants' Union and the All India Federation of Lawyers in their joint statement said that the situation on the Korean Peninsula is reaching an uncontrollable phase due to the unpardonable and reckless acts of the warmongers hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society expressed concern over the acute phase of confrontation being created on the Korean Peninsula owing to the Lee Myung Bak group's reckless acts.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that the Juche idea followers of Nigeria are considering the DPRK as their second motherland and the dignity of its supreme leadership as the most precious honor.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association bitterly denounced the south Korean authorities for their grave provocations and urged them to apologize for them at once and take immediate steps for guaranteeing the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea, in a statement fully supported the stand of the army and people of the DPRK determined to wage a sacred war for justice and retaliation.
					
					 The Peruvian Committee for Solidarity with Peoples in a statement pointed out that the army and people of the DPRK would deal deserved punishment to the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					
					 The General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute expressed belief that the army and people of the DPRK would always win victory in the struggle to shatter the ceaseless provocations of the imperialists and their stooges under the leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Continuan mitines de condena a traidores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Continuan mitines de condena a traidores surcoreanos
 Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea prosiguen los mitines de militares y civiles de ciudades (municipios)  y distritos para enterrar con la guerra sagrada y despiadada a la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak que difamo la maxima dignidad de aquella.
					 En las ocasiones se dio lectura a la declaracion del portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea y hubo intervenciones.
					
					 Los oradores destacaron que la banda de traidores, manada de perros rabiosos, difamo histericamente nuestra maxima dignidad y el regimen socialista al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares.
					
					 El traidor Lee y sus seguidores belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana son canceres de la nacion y enemigos jurados, que no pueden vivir juntos bajo el mismo cielo, denunciaron y prosiguieron:
					
					 Hay que echar al fondo de la zanja Lee Myung Bak, Kim Kwan Jin y Jong Sung Jo, escorias humanas, traidores a la nacion.
					
					 Por ultimo expresaron la voluntad de registrar la mayor innovacion y salto en todos los campos de la construccion de un Estado prospero con la voluntad de aniquilar hasta el ultimo tipejo de los enemigos jurados.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak repudiado por opinion publica
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak repudiado por opinion publica
 Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- "Lee Myung Bak debe morir como el rumor. El articulo divulgado el dia 11 por el diario Rodong Sinmun reflejo tal como es el pensamiento de todos nosotros."
					 Asi dijo a la ACNC Tokgo Hyon Song (46 anos de edad), morador en el capitalino municipio de Phyongchon.
					
					 Destaco que la vehemente indignacion a la banda de traidores motivo expansion de tal rumor e insistio en que la opinion publica es la voluntad divina, por lo tanto, la banda de Lee, enemigo jurado de la nacion, no podra vivir jamas en esta tierra.
					
					 La moradora Jong In Bok (58 anos de edad) en la ciudad de Phyongsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur dijo:
					
					 Tambien escuche tal rumor.
					
					 Aunque muera Lee Myung Bak, no se cambiara el caracter reaccionario del "poder" surcoreano. Creo que la colera furiosa por los tremendos actos de la banda de Lee genero tal rumor. !Que lastima que haya vivo este maldito Lee!
					
					 La opinion publica ya sentencio la muerte a la banda de traidores, por eso, Lee Myung Bak debe morir cuanto antes segun la sentencia de la opinion publica.
					
					 El dia 10 en diversas localidades del pais, sobre todo en Pyongyang, se difundio en un abrir y cerrar los ojos el rumor de que "!el tipejo Lee Myung Bak murio!" y "Lee Myung Bak murio por la paralisis cardiaca lleno de colera".
					
					 Dicen que algunas personas bailaron muy alegres despues de escucharlo.

articles.title: Amnistia Internacional exige a Japon asumir responsabilidad juridica
articles.content:
Amnistia Internacional exige a Japon asumir responsabilidad juridica
 Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- El dia 8, la Amnistia Internacional hizo publica una declaracion demandando al gobierno japones cumplir su responsabilidad juridica por el caso de ex consoladoras sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones.
					 De acuerdo con su texto, se realiza mas de mil veces frente a la embajada japonesa en Seul el mitin del miercoles, iniciado desde el ano 1992 en demanda de la solucion de ese tema y la Corte Constitucional del Sur de Corea sentencio como inconstitucional la inaccion del gobierno surcoreano en exigir a Japon pedir disculpas e indemnizar por esa esclavitud sexual.
					
					 El gobierno japones insiste persistentemente en que ha cumplido toda su obligacion de indemnizar y no habra mas recompensa, condena la nota.
					
					 Revela que muchas ex consoladoras sexuales fallecieron sin poder desahogarse de su rencor y las sobrevivientes sufren tambien en lo fisico y mental.
					
					 Senalando que el gobierno japones debe recuperar el honor de las victimas, la nota demanda los siguientes puntos:
					
					 Que la Dieta de Japon pida disculpas a las victimas sobrevivientes en terminos perfectos y claros.
					
					 Que el gobierno y la Dieta de Japon revisen la ley nacional desde el punto de vista de eliminar todo lo que obstaculice procurar la indemnizacion en la Corte de Japon e incluyan en los manuales las explicaciones sobre el crimen de esclavitud sexual.
					
					 Que el gobierno japones ejecute inmediatamente eficientes medidas administrativas para indemnizar a todas las victimas sobrevivientes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena al fracaso la campana belicista de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena al fracaso la campana belicista de EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- En su habito de desatar la guerra de agresion por doquier del mundo, el imperialismo norteamericano fomenta el clima belico en el Medio Oriente y en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno en cooperacion con sus satelites locales como Israel, Sur de Corea y Japon.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en articulo individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					 Las maniobras belicistas de los imperialistas seran condenadas y repudiadas por los pueblos pacifistas del mundo.
					
					 El imperialismo no se arruina por si solo y se derrumbara mas pronto si las fuerzas independientes antiimperialistas intensifican su lucha.
					
					 El espiritu independiente antiimperialista es el medio mas poderoso para frustrar la campana belica de los imperialistas.
					
					 EE.UU. no se atreve a atentar contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea porque teme a la unidad del pueblo coreano decidido a defender a ultranza a su lider.
					
					 Las poderosas fuerzas de autodefensa son la garantia de frustrar la despotica campana belica de los imperialistas.
					
					 Si los paises aspirantes a la independencia antiimperialista luchan con las fuerzas unidas, es posible conseguir la paz duradera.
					
					 La victoria esta al lado de los pueblos pacifistas del mundo que luchan contra los caducos y reaccionarios imperialistas.
